segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with a woman drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and seems focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit wobbly to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are so intent on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR
